name: Drawback Dungeon (GMTK 2022)
description:
As a brave knight, venture into the DRAWBACK DUNGEON in order to defeat an ancient chaos god, RANDO.  Along the way, collect strange relics to bolster your abilities.  However, be cautious. Each relic comes with a hidden cost that is only revealed when the relic is chosen.

CONTROLS:

Left and right arrows - Move

Z - Jump

X - Attack

Up arrow - Interact

Y - Speak

Dev notes:

  • All art lovingly drawn in MS Paint during the jam
  • All music made in Jummbox  (lol just 3 songs) and all SFX were made during the jam
  • I only had time to make 2 full(ish) levels. I guess you can run around the third one
  • Run out the hourglass in a level for a cool surprise
  • Your character can speak! Press Y to say a cool catchphrase!
  • Thanks Jacob (sorry I couldn't use your 3 tiles)
